parameters.name: CharId
parameters.description:
The ID of the chart.

>  You can call the [DescribeChartList](~~DescribeChartList~~) operation to query the ID. This parameter is required if the report version is 1.0.0.

parameters.name: ChartId
parameters.description:
The ID of the chart.

>  You can call the [DescribeChartList](~~DescribeChartList~~) operation to query the ID. This parameter is required if the report version is 2.0.0.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language of the content within the request and response. Default value: **zh**. Valid values:

*   **zh**: Chinese
*   **en**: English

parameters.name: ReportId
parameters.description:
The ID of the security report.

>  You can call the [DescribeCustomizeReportList](~~DescribeCustomizeReportList~~) operation to query the ID.

parameters.name: TimeEnd
parameters.description: The end of the time range to query. The value is a UNIX timestamp. Unit: milliseconds.

parameters.name: TimeStart
parameters.description: The beginning of the time range to query. The value is a UNIX timestamp. Unit: milliseconds.
